title: 中国人跋涉数千英里经陆路逃离伊朗 | 路透社 --- Chinese travel thousands of miles to flee Iran overland | Reuters
newsTitle: Chinese travel thousands of miles to flee Iran overland
content: Chinese travel thousands of miles to flee Iran overlandBy Joe Cash,  Tiffany Le and Liz Lee作者： Joe Cash 、 Tiffany Le 和 Liz LeeJune 18, 20255:46 PM GMT+8Updated 38 mins agoTextSmall TextMedium TextLarge TextShareXFacebookLinkedinEmailLinkSummary  概括Companies  公司China has begun evacuating its citizens from Iran  中国已开始从伊朗撤离其公民Several thousands Chinese nationals thought to live in Iran据信有数千名中国公民居住在伊朗Most Chinese in Iran are engineers working for Chinese firms  在伊朗的中国人大多是为中国公司工作的工程师Iran is Beijing's ...
